channel.title: Slayer Options - Making them work
channel.description:
Hey guys I was wondering how do I get my shop to open using my Slayer master Kuradal.
So far these are my options for Kuradal and Duradel: Talk Get Task Teleport Rewards
I have three of them working except for Rewards. I was wondering how would I open that up and make it become a Slayer Shop. I got the shop all set up, but I just can't figure out how to open that Rewards option.
